title: feat: Migration to Android (Kotlin/Compose)
head: feature/android-migration
body:
This PR introduces the initial boilerplate for converting the CoC automation script into a native Android application using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose.

### Changes:
- Added BotEngine.kt: A Coroutine-based state machine for bot logic.
- Added BotControlPanel.kt: A modern Jetpack Compose UI for bot control.
- Initial build.gradle configuration for Android application.

Next steps include implementing Accessibility Service and MediaProjection for screen capture and automated clicks.
